label: referencedTradeTransaction
comment: A trade transaction referenced in this line trade settlement.

rangeIncludes.comment: Agreement, contract, exchange, understanding, or transfer of cash or property that occurs between two or more parties.

domainIncludes.comment: The information, at a line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
